name: Material Dark GitHub
description: IMPORTANT NOTICE - 29/05/2020 *** Since userstyles.org is broken and unmaintened, I decided to move to GitHub. You can install the new version by clicking this link Home page and Instructions Support The version on this website is not up to date anymore from 29/05/2020. I won't answer to bugs or requests submitted here. *** A Material Dark Theme for GitHub. Based on Jetbrains Material theme. 3 themes available : Oceanic, Darker, Palenight If your eyes like it, I did the same on some other well-known websites with the same theme: https://userstyles.org/users/763420
additional_info:
CHANGELOG:

29/05/2020

- The theme moved to github. You have to reinstall it from here. - The theme now has its own configurator! It's a breaking change, so you may lose some of your customization. - This is the last update I will publish on userstyles.org.

28/05/2020

- Fix #20 (thanks to @FadeMind for reporting)

27/05/2020

- Fix #28 (thanks to @legonigel for reporting)

24/05/2020

- Fix #25 (thanks to @jnsn for reporting) - Improve readability on code additions and deletions - Fix #26 (thanks to @jnsn for reporting) - Fix #24 (thanks to @deadcoder0904 for reporting) - Fix #23 (thank to @stirante for reporting) - Redesign Notifications page - Fix #22 (thanks to @xan2622 for reporting) - Fix #19 - thanks to @FadeMind for reporting this - 31/03/2020: Fix some icons color Fix some icons background Fix dropdown divider color Replace github blue background in multiple places Theme insights(pulse) part of github - 30/03/2020: Fixes label colors (reported by @tycho01) + Fix theme missing in sorting and filters dropdowns - 29/03/2020: Theme applied to developer.github.com too! - 26/03/2020: expand `a:not(.IssueLabel)` with `:not(.IssueLabel--big)` (thanks to @tycho01) UPDATE : Reverted, waiting for a fix UPDATE : Fixed! - 25/03/2020: maintain dark font for code snippets highlighted with yellow background (thanks to @tycho01) - 23/03/2020: Add support for Refined GitHub (thanks to @Alex-D and @Suburbanno) - 22/03/2020: Fix some minor issues + theme explore page - 17/02/2020: Add style for selected lines (thanks to @mabrizio) + Add style for new notifications beta system (thanks to @xan2622) - 09/02/2020: Fix a lot of things! (Header in projects and PR views, user contributions on profile, code syntax highlighting on editing, and other minor fixes) Thanks to @neilitalia, Marcos Sanchez, Jason Del Ponte, Noobish1 - 24/11/2019: Fix Organisation header background color - 23/11/2019: Fix diffbar and pr-toolbar background-color (Thanks to poly2d) - 21/11/2019: Fix menu hover background color (Thanks to poly2d) + timeline-comment caret color + popover + some buttons in dropdowns + timeline elements - 05/11/2019: Fix colors of comments and some other elements (Thanks to joaomcarlos) - 08/10/2019: Fix color of commit sha label (Thanks to poly2d) - 13/09/2019: Fix text unreadable in comments

discussions.name: Code Diff expanded sections have white background
Code Diff expanded sections have white background
